alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coahoma, northwestern Tallahatchie and southwestern Quitman Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarksdale, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Marks, Lambert, Belen, Dublin, Vance, Lyon, West Marks, Mattson, Counts, Hopson, Barksdale, Denton, Riverview, Longstreet, Beverly, Hinchcliff, Sabino, Lurand and Beaver Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
